title: Chevron says its business is resilient to climate change
text:
... Chevron Corp said on Thursday its business is resilient to a wide variety of
possible climate change scenarios as the U.S. oil company and other producers
come under pressure to invest less in oil projects and more in renewable energy.

title: Advocates blame oil giants for climate change, call Chevron No. 1 ...
text:

title: Chevron, oil companies will tell federal judge climate change is real ...
text:

title: Chevron warns it could face climate change lawsuits with future oil ...
text:
... In an industry first, one of the world's biggest oil companies has warned it could
face legal action over climate change. Chevron, the California-based
multinational, admitted it could be the subject of “governmental investigations
and, potentially, private litigation” because of its role in causing global warming.
